detail_desc: 5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist and slim legs.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, decorative zips at the front and slim legs with seams.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and gathered frills at the top. The polyester content of the bikini bottoms is recycled.
Leggings in heavy jersey with flatlock seams. High waist with covered elastication.
Double-layered tube scarf in cotton jersey with an all-over print on the outside.
Jumper in a fine knit containing glittery threads with long sleeves and a ribbed polo neck.

Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue and hook and loop fastening at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Slightly longer cardigan in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined swimsuit with cut-out details at the sides and a partially open back. Shoulder straps that join to form a racer back, and medium coverage at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace and microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and high cut at the back.
Earrings with plastic beads and tassels. Length 8.5 cm.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave. Detachable hood with an elasticated edge and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Adjustable elastication at the waist, front pockets and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a slightly wider, raw-edge neckline, seam centre back and short, raw-edged sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist.
Leggings in soft, stretch cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Hair elastics decorated with faux fur pompoms.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless, knee-length jersey dress with draping at the top and gathers at the sides for best fit. Lined.

Trousers in a stretch weave with a high, paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem.
Top in a patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and pearly buttons down the front. Smocking at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem.

Sleeveless shirt dress in a soft, patterned cotton weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button and side pockets. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Gloves knitted in a cashmere blend with a high shaft.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Cotton jersey briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.

Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, moulded, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Hi-tops with an adjustable hook and loop tab, elasticated lacing, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of coordinated leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a seam at the hips and gathered flounce at the hem. Ankle-length leggings with an elasticated waist.
Treggings in soft stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button and back pockets.
Bikini briefs in microfibre and lace with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a chest pocket.
Wide T-shirt in cotton jersey with wide sleeves in a cotton weave. The sleeves have an elasticated seam and slit underneath.
Large earrings with an asymmetric, textured metal disc at the top and long sparkly stone fringes. Length 10 cm.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size approx. 68x180 cm.
Cold shoulder jumper in a ribbed cotton blend with a small, ribbed stand-up collar, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, padded top edge, a pile tongue and lacing with speed hooks. Pile linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit merino wool blend with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a gently draped collar, V-neck and wrapover front. Long, wide sleeves with wide cuffs and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Fitted, short-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey.

Glittery, printed trainers with adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned, transparent soles with motion-activated flashing LED lights in various colours.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Loafers in velour with textile linings, quilted satin insoles and fluted soles.

Padded parka with a detachable lined hood with a faux fur trim and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets, a zipped sleeve pocket and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Smart shirt in a woven cotton blend with a button-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie or bow tie.
Double-breasted, straight-style coat in a felted wool blend with peak lapels, flap front pockets, two inner pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Jumper for a dog in a soft cable knit with a polo neck, ribbing around the front legs and openings for the back legs. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with open sides for easier nursing access. Ties at the sides and a decorative longer section at the hem in an airy weave.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist and lined gusset.
Espadrilles in cotton canvas with a braided jute trim around the soles and elastication at the heels. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved cotton piqué top with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and narrow ribbing at the cuffs.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with gathered hems. Unlined.
Chino shorts in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.
Knee-length jacket in airy, patterned chiffon with low dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. Wrapover front with a tie belt at the waist.
Cold shoulder blouse in a viscose weave with narrow adjustable shoulder straps, elastication and a flounce at the top, long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and a smocked hem.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a print motif on the front. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Wide leather waist belt with a large metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Cold shoulder dress in patterned jersey with a flounce at the top, seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Top in soft, patterned viscose jersey with an opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. Short, flounced sleeves with smocking over the shoulders, and gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and fluted rubber soles.

Calf-length, pull-on trousers in a cotton weave. Regular, elasticated waist with a frill trim at the top and decorative bow at the front. Small embroidered motif below the waistband, a fake fly, side pockets and gently tapered legs.
Fitted top in fast-drying, functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with long, raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow shoulder straps that cross and the back, and ties at the back.
Trousers in jersey crêpe with wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy and gently flared legs with raw edges down the side seams.
Platform sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with concealed elastication and a metal buckle. Fabric insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, heel 10 cm.
Long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections at the sides and reflective details. Brushed thermal inside.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and long legs.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight, wide legs.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set in soft cotton jersey with a hooded jacket, T-shirt and joggers with a print motif. Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. T-shirt in jersey with a ribbed neckline. Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and front pockets.
Running top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and reflective details. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Sports trousers in sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped side pockets, a mesh section at the crotch and wide ribbing at the hems.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft cotton piqué with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
